bouquet.name: Pinky pinks
bouquet.description: What do we say when you want to treat your loved ones like a princess? We say go pink!

bouquet.name: Summer treat
bouquet.description: A combination of purple orange and pink hues all in one en grande bouquet. Grab one now and make someone's heart grow even bigger!

bouquet.name: Spring-y
bouquet.description: Pastel colored flowers all in one bouquet, make them blush like those roses!

bouquet.name: Sunny surprise
bouquet.description: Isn't it all hot in here?! Well, a sunny day inspired arrangement of flowers might be the coolest way to spice things up with your loved ones any day.
